cab.content: - 267 hColonel Jones Jffhis document is the property of His Britannic Majestyfs government.SB C R E T. &.T. 3686 A.WAR CAB I 11 B f.AIR RAID PRECAUTIONS.Memorandum by Lord Rothermere ( G.T.3686)I am directed by the Prime Minister to draw attention to the above Memorandum, which was circulated on the 2 nd instant, and to request that it may be studied by all Departments ooncerned ^nth a view to suitable action being taken.M.P.A. Hankey.r, Whitehall gardens, S.W. 3rd February, 1918.
